oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Indexing scheme for classes of L-N; Partitions of N
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: FRIISJENSEN, B
RETTRUP, S
SARMA, CR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: configuration-interaction
symmetric group
partitions
graphical representations
classes of l-n
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The classes of the symmetric group L-N are identified by partitions of N. In this work an indexing scheme is presented which provides a dense enumeration of the classes of L-N. The method is based on a graphical representation of partitions of N, which also enables the determination of the class corresponding to a given number. (C) 1997 , Inc.
